name: Lylo.ai
description: Lylo — First AI UX for crypto, built as a Cosmos-based L1 for cross-chain execution. Lylo is the first AI-native UX layer for crypto—where users speak a prompt, and execution happens instantly across every chain. As a Cosmos L1, Lylo abstracts the complexity of multi-chain DeFi into a single, conversational interface. No dashboards. No toggles. No code. Just pure intent-to-action automation. Lylo transforms how both users and developers interact with on-chain systems. At the core is an AI agent that parses natural language into deterministic execution graphs and dispatches them through Lylo Chain—an IBC-native execution layer. The result is verifiable, cross-chain automation that feels like Web2 but functions with full Web3 composability and transparency.
